    • Constructor Detail

      • Resolution

        public Resolution(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> solverControl,
                  GlobalParameters globalParameters,
                  CentralProcessor centralProcessor)
        constructs a new taskSupplier of type RandomWalker. The constructor is called serially. Therefore there are no race conditions. globalParameters and centralProcessor are shared between different threads. The walker is passive in the sense that it does not send data to the CentralDataHolder.
        Parameters:
        solverControl - contains the parameters for controlling the taskSupplier
        globalParameters - contains the global control parameters
        centralProcessor - contains the result of parsing and initializing the problem data.

    • Method Detail

      • parseParameters

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> parseParameters(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters,
                                                                                                        java.lang.StringBuffer errors,
                                                                                                        java.lang.StringBuffer warnings)
        parses a HashMap with key-value pairs:
        Parameters:
        parameters - the parameters with the keys "seed", "sos", "limit"
        errors - for error messages
        warnings - for warnings
        Returns:
        a list of HashMaps with keys "seed" and "sos", "limit".

      • solve

        public Result solve()
        Description copied from class: Solver
        The key method, which has to be implemented by the solvers. It is supposed to find a model or a contradiction in the clauses.
        Specified by:
        solve in class Solver
        Returns:
        Un/Satisfiable or null

      • selectParentClause1

        private Clause selectParentClause1(int group)
        selects the first parent clause for the resolution. The clause is again inserted in the listPosition chain, but with different listPosition, such that next time another clause will be chosen.
        Parameters:
        group - a clause group
        Returns:
        the first parent clause

      • selectParentLiteral1

        private CLiteral selectParentLiteral1(Clause parentClause1)
        chooses a resolution literal in the first parent clause. It chooses the literal which is most likely to get pure.
        Parameters:
        parentClause1 - the first parent clause
        Returns:
        a literal in this clause

      • selectParentLiteral2

        private CLiteral selectParentLiteral2(CLiteral parentLiteral1)
        chooses the second parent literal for the resolution. It selects the literal in the smallest clause
        Parameters:
        parentLiteral1 - the first parent literal
        Returns:
        the second parent literal

      • reportResolvent

        private void reportResolvent(Clause resolvent)
        reports the resolvent via the monitor and updates the statistics
        Parameters:
        resolvent - the new resolvent

      • reportAbortion

        private void reportAbortion(int limit)
        reports that the resolution has been aborted
        Parameters:
        limit - the maximum number of resolvents

      • reportFinished

        private void reportFinished(Result result,
                            int resolvents,
                            java.lang.Thread thread)
        reports that the resolution has been finished
        Parameters:
        result - the result of the resolution
        resolvents - the number of resolvents.
        thread - which executed the taskSupplier
